ourPlaces.description1: Embark on an adventure to Mount Roraima, the highest peak in Canaima National Park, a mystical place where you can admire majestic waterfalls, crystal-clear rivers, and unique rock formations.
ourPlaces.description2: Sail through Mochima National Park, an archipelago of 34 paradisiacal islands, where you can enjoy white sand beaches, turquoise waters, and a wide variety of water sports.
ourPlaces.description3: Discover the City of the Knights, Merida, a colonial city surrounded by Andean mountains, where you can visit Pico Bolivar, the highest mountain in Venezuela, and enjoy charming towns and lush landscapes.
ourPlaces.description4: Relax in Morrocoy National Park, a natural paradise made up of 150 white sand cays and crystal-clear waters, where you can go snorkeling, diving, and enjoy the tranquility of the Caribbean Sea.
ourPlaces.description5: Enjoy Margarita Island, known as the Pearl of the Caribbean, a tourist destination par excellence, where you can find dream beaches, a vibrant nightlife, and a wide variety of activities for the whole family.
ourPlaces.description6: Visit Puerto La Cruz, a coastal city with a beautiful boardwalk, where you can enjoy delicious local cuisine, shop at artisan markets, and visit historical sites such as the San Felipe de la Barra Castle.
ourPlaces.description7: Venture into the Medanos de Coro, a white sand dune desert that stretches for over 15,000 hectares, where you can enjoy activities such as camel rides, sandboarding, and unforgettable sunsets.
ourPlaces.description8: Discover Los Roques, an archipelago of 49 coral islands, considered one of the most beautiful national parks in the world, where you can enjoy pristine beaches, crystal-clear waters, and a wide variety of marine life.

footer.description: At Guacamaya Airlines, we are more than just an airline, we are a bridge that connects you to the most paradisiacal corners of Venezuela. With an impeccable track record and a team passionate about flying, we are proud to offer an unparalleled travel experience, where comfort, safety and personalized attention are our fundamental pillars.

faq1.a: Each passenger is allowed one carry-on bag and one checked bag. Please refer to our policies for more details on size and weight restrictions.

faq2.a: You can check in online through our website or mobile app, or at the airport check-in counter.

faq3.q: What should I do if I miss my flight?
faq3.a: If you miss your flight, please contact our staff at the airport for assistance. Depending on the situation, we may be able to reschedule your flight without additional charges.

faq4.a: Yes, you can change your reservation subject to availability and additional fees. We recommend that you review our change policies before making any modifications.

faq5.q: What should I do if I have an additional question?
faq5.a: If you have any additional questions, please do not hesitate to contact our customer service team. We are here to assist you with anything you need.

banner.text1: We invite you to discover the magic of Venezuela.
banner.text2: Book your next flight today and live an unforgettable experience...
